Description:
Detects a remote file copy attempt to a hidden network share. This may indicate lateral movement or data staging activity.

Author: Tim Rauch, Elastic (idea)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Privilege Escalation via Named Pipe Impersonation
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\cmd.exe' or process_path like '%\powershell.exe') and (original_file_name = 'cmd.exe' or original_file_name = 'powershell.exe')) and (command like '%echo%' and command like '%>%' and command like '%\\\\.\\pipe\\%'))
